article_title: Doctors sell three practices to hospital

article_metadata.description: COLDWATER — More and more hospitals are buying local medical practices and employing the doctor as an employee. Community Health Center of Branch County trustees approved the purchase of assets of three area physicians, and hiring the doctors as employees for 2016.Sometime in March, the Coldwater OB/GYN practice of Dr. Edward Lake, will transfer to the hospital.As of Jan. 1, Dr. Tania Berry, DO of the Family Practice of Bronson, and Dr. Troy Davis, DO of Litchfield Family Health Clinic
article_metadata.author: Don Reid

og.description: COLDWATER — More and more hospitals are buying local medical practices and employing the doctor as an employee. Community Health Center of Branch
